name: The End o,,,o (itch)
description:
You can only walk, jump and use fire
to avoid death and find your way back home.

All assets custom made.
With sound and varying background music.
17 game world screens.
5 simple riddles.
3 bosses.
13 colors.
3 FPS.
Challenging controls.

Initially designed for C64.
Then developed as a scripted object inside of an online virtual world.
But now ported to PC while staying true to most of the previous limitations.

System and License Requirements (Linux)
System and License Requirements (Windows)
